<ul class="MMM--pdpList SNAPS--bullets">
<li>It guarantees a good closure on very large boxes (household appliances for example).</li>
<li>High tensile strength. Good shear strength.</li>
<li>Good support for a wide range of applications</li>
<li>Resists abrasion and moisture.</li>
<li>Features a hand break to add tension to the tape roll, up to 25 mm</li>
</ul>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes">Mainly used for holding boxes together on pallets, salvaging torn and damaged boxes, bundling of light weight products, closing and reinforcing of fiberboard boxes.</p>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes">Additional security: Due to filaments in length, the tape does not break easily in the horizontal section.</p>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes"></p>
